Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Neurotransmitter Agents/Dopamine Agents
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Neurotransmitter Agents/Dopamine Agents
Record.Description: Any drugs that are used for their effects on dopamine receptors, on the life cycle of dopamine, or on the survival of dopaminergic neurons.
